content.html: Every so often, I help to make a small difference ☺ "There is an expectation that government software and code is open-source by default. This means it should be developed in the open and published using an Open Source Initiative approved licence." gov.uk/government/pub…
content.value:
Every so often, I help to make a small difference ☺

"There is an expectation that government software and code is open-source by default. This means it should be developed in the open and published using an Open Source Initiative approved licence."
gov.uk/government/pub…
